SEARCH
Module com.learneria.controller
Package com.learneria.utils

Class Database

java.lang.Object
com.learneria.utils.Database
public class Database extends Object
The Database class provides a singleton-based interface for all SQLite interactions in Papa's Learneria. It handles user management, score tracking, word retrieval, and teacher-classroom systems.

It also supports automatic creation of necessary tables and insertion of default words for grammar, food, and nature games.

Extended features include teacher-class management, quiz records, and score analytics.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Database getInstance() throws SQLException
      Returns the singleton instance of Database. Reconnects automatically if the previous connection was closed.
      Returns:
      the single shared instance of Database
      Throws:
      SQLException - if initialization or reconnection fails

    • getConnection

      public Connection getConnection()
      Returns the active Connection instance. If the connection is closed or null, it will reconnect automatically.
      Returns:
      a valid SQL connection object

    • connect

      public static Connection connect()
      Provides a shortcut static accessor for acquiring the current connection.
      Returns:
      a valid SQLite connection
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if initialization fails

    • updateScore

      public static void updateScore(String username, String category, int score, int correct, int incorrect, double avgSpeed)
      Inserts a new score record into the scores table.
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username
      category - the game category (e.g., Grammar, Food)
      score - the total score achieved
      correct - number of correct answers
      incorrect - number of incorrect answers
      avgSpeed - average response speed

    • getRandomWord

      public static String getRandomWord(String category)
      Retrieves a random word from the specified category.
      Parameters:
      category - the category to filter by (e.g., "Noun", "Fruit")
      Returns:
      a random word from the given category, or null if not found
